name: A Sun Of Salt
description:
太陽の塩 - A Sun Of Salt
Unravel the mystery, the horror, and the people aboard your ship as captain of a small crew on a lifelong mission into the unknown.Game Features:
  • Visual novel gameplay.
  • Get to know an evolving cast of characters.
  • Take part in a dramatic sci-fi tale that can turn from romance to horror in an instant.
  • Unravel the true nature of your mission.
  • Experience love, death, or friendship in branching paths that lead to one of 4 endings.
  • Get a small glimpse into the mind of your crew with experimental technology.
